synopsis.text:
Minori, Kouta, Rakuta, and their enigmatic leader, 12-year-old Mayuki Hyuuga, reside in the remnants of what was once Tokyo, now known as Kyuto. Thirty years ago, a devastating earthquake, referred to as The Great Fall, left the city in ruins. While most people have moved on to a new capital, the group remains, investigating a series of bizarre murders and supernatural events that plague the old city.

Mayuki, the head of the Hyuuga family, possesses extraordinary detective skills and unique extrasensory abilities that allow him to see through the mysteries surrounding these strange occurrences. Despite the fear and terror that grip the people, Mayuki remains undeterred, using his special insight power to uncover the truth.

As they delve deeper into the heart of these supernatural crimes, the group begins to unravel the sinister forces orchestrating the events. Who are these nefarious beings, and what do they want? Join Mayuki and his friends as they navigate the treacherous landscape of Kyuto, seeking answers and justice in this gripping anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
